scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a publicly accessible customer churn prediction model deployed by a consumer banking institution. The actor uses a model inversion attack to infer private customer attributes such as income and credit score.
initial_goal: Infer customer income and credit score from the publicly accessible churn prediction API.
enterprise_context: Consumer Banking: A large consumer banking institution has deployed a machine learning model to predict customer churn. The model is accessible via a public API that allows users to submit anonymized customer data and receive a churn probability score.
